reviewText: I am really disappointed with particular purchase. When I opened my pkg. it was in some weird language that I could not understand. It would not play in any DVD player or computer hard drive. When I called Amazon to get it replaced with one that was in English they told me that they had not yet released the English version yet.  I didn't understand why in the world they would send someone in the USA a copy that you could not understand because it was in GERMAN! I am hoping that someone from Amazon will make it right and send me the English version.
I grew up in this era and have all of the movies ever made from the Vietnam War  I cannot say they are pleasant movies, but I am glad to be able to see what that war did to our young men.
